title: What is The Most Popular Role?
body: This is just a fun poll to see which role I should main, what other people like and what people dont like playing.

replies.body:
I don't think the poll is relevant to the topic. Roles are:
1)  top 
2) mid 
3) jg 
4) adc 
5) sup. 

Those listed in the poll are classes. Note that different class can fulfill different roles.
I personally enjoy jungling when I'm tired of the standard laning phase. It provides a different gameplay compared to the other above listed roles.
No, I disagree. Lanes are the 'things' that you call mid top etc. roles are what I put in the poll.
The most unpopular role is support (because its hard to "carry" from. not impossible just harder). the most popular is probably mid or adc.
I love support what you on about?

im sorry, the poll must have been whats the most popular role for Riso? LOL

Support is a role the majority of people don't play. the number off times people say "not support" is more than any other role

XD But I find people who dont usually support and are stuck in it, suck at the basics like good warding. Which makes me always feel like I need to play support with all my friends because I know of their capabilities. I have 2 friends who completely scared of jungling because they don't know how to do it. I know this was a completely wasted time posting this and no ones going to read this XD
U werent right about the last thing.

Mid is prob the most popular lane to go, followed by top.

I am still disturbed by the fact people now use lanes to refer roles, it's annoying to my eyes personally.
Assassin Mid. Is where everyone wants to be.
